SPOM.content: “a culture began before culture—and humanity, capitalization also,” a culture destined to survive them: exchange-value is exceeded by the gift, market equivalence arrests the dance (of the commodity) it seemed to initiate
SPOM.linkedContent: “a culture began before culture—and humanity, capitalization also,” a culture destined to survive them: exchange-value is exceeded by the gift, market equivalence arrests the dance (of the commodity) it seemed to initiate

VM.content: avoid the worst by vigilance that takes finitude (history) seriously: that fights light w/ light: philosopher must speak and write w/in this war of light, in which he knows he’s already engaged; the worst is night, which precedes or represses discourse
VM.linkedContent: avoid the worst by vigilance that takes finitude (history) seriously: that fights light w/ light: philosopher must speak and write w/in this war of light, in which he knows he’s already engaged; the worst is night, which precedes or represses discourse

VM.content: an economy of violence (economy irreducible to Levinas’ definition) that tolerates neither finite totality, nor positive infinity
VM.linkedContent: an economy of violence (economy irreducible to Levinas’ definition) that tolerates neither finite totality, nor positive infinity

PAS.content: eternal ring, passivity of nonpower, strength in reception, restarts alliance w/out debt, gift w/out credit
PAS.linkedContent: eternal ring, passivity of nonpower, strength in reception, restarts alliance w/out debt, gift w/out credit

PAS.content: (transgressive, completely passive) pas enacts a crossing of border that leaves border unscathed (indemne): bord sans bord, w/out any dialectical reappropriation
PAS.linkedContent: (transgressive, completely passive) pas enacts a crossing of border that leaves border unscathed (indemne): bord sans bord, w/out any dialectical reappropriation
